synopsis.text:
For generations, the mouse clan has been under the steadfast leadership of Leopold, their oldest member. As age begins to wear on him, the task of selecting a successor becomes paramount. Enter George and Gerald, two brave mice considered as potential heirs to Leopold's position. To prove their worth and determine the most suitable candidate, they are tasked with a daunting mission: to capture the elusive 'Dragon of Light' residing in the distant Valley of the Moon.

Joined by a trio of loyal companions, George and Gerald embark on an epic adventure filled with trials and tribulations. Their journey is not just a test of strength and courage, but also a quest for self-discovery and camaraderie. Will they be able to find the Dragon of Light and secure their place as the clan's new leader? Join George, Gerald, and their friends in this thrilling tale of bravery and friendship in 'Nezumi Monogatari'.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
